Header.title: Eastern Bird
Header.paragraph: Specialized in designing and manufacturing high-quality metal and steel furniture and more...

About.paragraph: Established in 1982 by Late Golak Chandra Sethi, Eastern Bird began its journey as a small manufacturing unit. Over the years, we have grown into a leading provider of metal and steel furniture and construction services, thanks to our commitment to excellence and innovation. Today, we are proud to carry on the founderâ€™s vision under the leadership of his elder son, Anshuman Rashmi Sagar Sethi, serving diverse industries with cutting-edge solutions.

Why.title: Quality
Why.body: Every product we deliver is a symbol of our dedication to precision, durability, and design excellence.

Why.title: Innovation
Why.body: We embrace modern technology and trends to create solutions that meet the evolving needs of our clients.

Why.title: Customer Satisfaction
Why.body: Our success is built on ensuring our clients are satisfied with every product and service we provide. We strive to exceed expectations with every project.

Why.title: Integrity
Why.body: Transparency and trust are at the heart of every relationship we build with our customers and partners.

Services.name: PEB Structures
Services.text: Industrial sheds, warehouses, office spaces, cottages, and more

Services.name: Structural Engineering
Services.text: Specialized construction of foot overbridges, warehouses, and other large-scale structures

Services.name: Turnkey Projects
Services.text: From concept to completion, we handle all aspects of construction for our clients, ensuring a hassle-free experience

Products.name: Residential Furniture
Products.text: Stylish and robust furniture for homes, including beds, chairs, tables, and storage solutions.

Products.name: Commercial Furniture
Products.text: High-quality furniture for offices, shops, and other commercial spaces

Products.name: Luxury Furniture
Products.text: Custom metal and steel furniture designed to add a touch of elegance to your living or working space

Products.name: Hostel Furniture
Products.text: Durable, long-lasting metal beds and storage solutions for hostels and dormitories

Products.name: School and College Furniture
Products.text: Functional and space-efficient solutions, including compact desk-cum-bench sets, dual desks, and other school essentials that meet the specific needs of educational institutions
